✔ Automatic or manual weather location
✔ Google FIT step counter with 7 days history
✔ Indicator in watch (Weather and app shortcuts)
✔ Shortcuts for Hangouts, Google Keep, Google Maps, Alarm clock, Stopwatch, Translate, Flashlight, Timer, Google Fit, Agenda, Find my phone
✔ Full ambient mode
✔ Smooth seconds
✔ System indicator positions
✔ Removed ads

★★★ Configuration in the companion app ★★★
✔ Automatic or custom added weather location (NEW!)
✔ Smooth seconds or tick seconds
✔ Screen time settings
✔ Weather update time
✔ Simple and full ambient mode
✔ Peek card configuration (transparent, small or big)

★  How to select shortcuts in the position (complication) ★

- Long tap on the watch face
- System shows icon "gear" for the watch face settings. Tap on it
- Select "Customize" option
- Select "Complications" option
- Select desired position
- Select "External Complication"
- Find "General" from list and select it
- Select "App shortcut" and choose desired app
You are ready to go.

★ Wear OS 2.0 integration
• Fully standalone! (iPhone and Android compatible)
• External complication data for the indicators

★ FAQ
!! Please contact us if you have any trouble with the app !!
richface.watch@gmail.com

How do I install the watch face on Wear OS 2.0?
1. Install it from Google Play Wear Store on your watch.
2. Install the companion app for fully customization (Android phone devices).

Why I can not see steps or activity data in a built-in complication?
To see steps and other fit data, you need to connect the app with Google Fit.
There are two options:
1. Connect to Google Fit via settings located on your smartwatch
2. Connect to Google Fit via settings located on the phone companion app (only for Android phone devices)

The watch face CANNOT be installed on smartwatches with TizenOS (Samsung Gear 2, 3, ..) or any other OS except WearOS


★ PERMISSIONS Explained
http://www.richface.watch/privacy.php
summary: Interactive watch face with additional menu options on watch
recentChanges:
Fixed small issue with the weather
Improved UI
comments: Really cool watch face however a battery drain making it unusable

Not happy with the watch. After buying the premium version the time between the Analog and digital clock does not match. For example if the time is 10:15 am in analog it shows 9:15 am in digital clock which cannot be changed. Other than that the watch looks very good.

Very disappointed with the new "upgrade". The lcd screen no longer allows a second time zone, isnt used to display step or weather information or even as the stopwatch display (so now you can't see the time and the stopwatch at the same time). Everything is an external screen. New purchases take note as the video still shows the old way, not how the watch face works now. Also can't configure the shortcuts on the watch bezel. This update essentially ruined my favorite watchface.

Hi, actually very pleased with the face design, but, a BIG BUT here, the newest update seems breaks the digital time, it doesnt update the time at all, the digital time stopped at the minute it was set and didn't move to the next minute, I've restarted the watch (im on fossil sport) with no luck, please repair this.

Love this watch face. This is, by far, my favorite watch face. Love all the detail. Love the "full ambient" mode. Shows both analog watch hands (good for a quick look) and also shows digital info data. Looks great, fun, useful.

title: Master Watch Face & Clock Widget
description:
Master Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of Master Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-GEN"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

title: Classic Watch Face
description:
Classic Watch Face is fully compatible with Android Wear 2.0 and is compatible with all Android Wear watches

★ Android Wear 2.0 integrated features
• external complication support
• fully standalone
• iPhone compatible

Classic Watch Face has a classic look and is build for using every day, it simplified many use cases such as launching programs, setting brightness and listening music.

Classic Watch Face is absolutely free and it has core options, but you can purchase the PREMIUM version with a lot of features and options.

FREE version includes:
★ 8 background colors
★ Own launcher
★ Own remote music control
★ Ability to change screen brightness from launcher
★ Weather forecast for current day
★ Detailed information of watch battery and phone battery
★ Google Fit data for current day

PREMIUM version includes:
★ All features from FREE version
★ Another 12 background colors
★ Use Night Mode for power saving features
★ Weather forecast for upcoming hours and days
★ Ability to change battery indicator type. Watches only or dual indicator (phone and watch)
★ Detailed Google Fit data for current day and last 7 days
★ Set two shortcuts with predefined views or actions
★ Set four Quick actions with predefined views or actions or any application on your watches
★ Choosing from three clock dial types
★ Set smooth seconds
★ Ability to change Keep watches screen awake interval
★ Ability to change Weather update interval
★ Ability to change Weather provider

The configuration in companion application contains:
★ Time and date format according to phone settings (12/24)
★ Enable touch feedback
★ Ability to set Grayscale Ambient mode for OLED displays
★ Show/Hide Battery indicator
★ Show/Hide Google Fit indicator
★ Show/Hide Weather indicator
★ Ability to change temperature units
★ Ability to change wind speed units
★ Information about last weather update

The HuskyDEV Classic Watch Face works great with squared and round watches.

For using Google Fit data in Classic Watch Face, you must confirm dialog on start, that application can read data from your phone.

Common synchronization problem solution:

If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:
- uninstall the face application from the phone
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Classic Watch Face once again

recentChanges:
Fix:
- The Sun/Rise information is not working on some time zones
comments: I wish there were some extra features. Removal of launch bar option and be able to move the date around. Also being able to choose what color the smaller dials are would be great. I would give 5 stars for these fixes.

Don't waste your money in "premium" content. The developer might produce good watch faces but they also delete watch faces you've purchased premium content for without notice or option to transfer. The deleted watch faces stop working or set display to almost zero brightness. Amateurs? Rip-off merchants? Or just idiots with a development SDK?
Was perfect for the ticwatch E. Now that I am using Michael Kors Lexington 2, the weather forcast will not update automatically no matter how long I choose for the interval.

I was very disappointed. It doesn't support my Ticwatch C2 to count steps, including google fit, the app let me allow it to turn on the GPS to count steps, unfortunately when I turned the GPS on, this function still doesn't work well.

Lags a ton, and the free "core" options only consists of changing the background colour and changing the notifications count from a dot to a numerical value. Free version is so limited, you can't even change the complications on the watch face itself (e.g. change the "Weather" function to something of your own choice). Due to the VERY limited experience on the free version, I am hesitant to purchase the premium version, since I can hardly judge the versatility of this watch face based on what I experienced with the free version. I understand watch face makers want to make money off premium versions of their watch faces (and I did purchase premium versions of watch faces I like), but this free version does not give me enough justification to purchase the premium version. To be fair though, visuals are sleek and the concept looks nice on paper.

comments: Pretty decent watch face if the style is what you like. After purchasing the pro option you get some decent customization options but it does lack in some areas if you're picky like me (like changing the text color is all at once, there isn't groups or anything.) All in all good face and even better with the pro option.
Lots of color variation. Very cool. Customizable widgets, launchers and app support.

So far my favorite day-to-day Wear OS watchface! it has a lot of information and room for complications without looking cluttered. The time is large and easy to see at a glance. It looks "techy" without being cheesy too, and all the round elements accentuate the round faces on the vast majority of today's Wear watches, and looks nice on my Ticwatch S2. I also like all the color combination choices. just wish I could custom name the shortcuts, the way they cut off doesnt look good sometimes.

Cool customizable color schemes-very easy to see time-shortcuts are custom too and very handy. Has all the typically useful functions without being too busy looking. Def worth it to get the premium version but the free one didn't suck either

First off... I installed this one because I liked the look of it but there are plenty more to choose from in the play store from this dev, all look good to me and this one looks even better on the my Ticwatch Pro. Originally I had a few issues and emailed the dev but it was all sorted very quickly, Thomas is a very approachable dev. For a standalone watch face this is a very well finished app with all wear OS complications and a multitude of colour options. Well worth the pennies for premium👍

descriptionHTML:
Swift Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of Swift Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-GEN"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
+ Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
+ Choose between up to 8 indicators
+ Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
+ Access to detailed data by touching a widget
+ Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
+ Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
+ Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
+ Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
+ Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
+ Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
+ Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!

recentChanges:
2.2.26.164

Option to force english on date
Updated Google Play Services revision
Complete refactoring of the code
If you have any issue, please let me know by email at thema.apps@gmail.com
comments: The best smart watch face app, PERIOD. Elegant, cool, customizable. Buy the premium. For a couple of dollars this app won't disappoint. There are lots of other watch face apps that are cluncky and cost much more. The only complaint is that this app isn't available on all platforms (iOS, Tizen, Google Wear, Fitbit). Obviously that's not easy to develop, but we'd all benefit from this app.
Just love the face created. I love that for a minimal amount, I have access to many faces. Thanks so much for the amazing app

I used the free version for a while and liked it, so bought the premium version. Unfortunately the sync between the phone and watch stopped working for some reason. I was not able to make any changes to the watch face even though the changes are saved under settings, the watch stayed on the default screen. I communicated with the developer and I have to admit, his response was quick and he even solved the issue within a day by releasing a update specific to my watch face. Excellent service.
Great features, but widgets are too small & don't change size when using fewer of them. Can't customize widget colors, either.

Installed the app yesterday, and within a half hour, had it perfectly customized to my liking.  Love the layout and the TONS of customization options..  Had a small issue trying to get a complication working correctly.  Sent the developer a message, and within a few minutes, had an answer to my issue; simple fix.  My favorite option is the ability to set the screen on-time.  Highly recommend the premium version of this this watch face (great value at $1.19), and will be looking at others from this developer!    FYI... There is a great review/how-to video of this watch face on Youtube on Jabber Tech.  Very in-depth explanation of the setup process and options.

title: Info Watch Face
description:
Info Watch Face is fully compatible with Android Wear 2.0 and is compatible with all Android Wear watches

★ Android Wear 2.0 integrated features
• external complication support
• fully standalone
• iPhone compatible

Info Watch Face with the ability to set 7 indicators with predefined views, actions or watch app shortcut. Info Watch Face is built for using every day, it simplified many use cases such as launching programs, setting brightness and listening music.

The application is absolutely free and it has core options, but you can purchase the PREMIUM version with a lot of features and options.



FREE version includes:
★ Own launcher
★ Own remote music control
★ Ability to change screen brightness from launcher
★ Weather forecast for current day
★ Detailed information of watch battery and phone battery
★ Google Fit data for current day

PREMIUM version includes:
★ All features from FREE version
★ Set 7 indicators with predefined views, actions or watch app shortcut
★ More than 15 language translations
★ Watch battery history chart
★ Endless accent colors
★ Weather forecast for upcoming hours and days
★ Detailed Google Fit data for current day and last 7 days
★ Choosing from four battery indicator types
★ Choosing from three Google Fit indicator types
★ Ability to change Keep watches screen awake interval
★ Ability to change Weather update interval
★ Ability to change Weather provider

The configuration in the application also contains:
★ Time and date format according to phone settings (12/24)
★ Enable touch feedback
★ Ability to change temperature units
★ Ability to change wind speed units
★ Information about last weather update


Common synchronization problem solution:

If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:
- uninstall the face application from the phone
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Info Watch Face once again

comments: It appears that the developer is no longer addressing problems with apps. Weather Reborn has disappeared. The picture of the free version of this face shows the ability to show both watch and phone batteries, but only the watch battery displays with no ability to change. Weather shows a temperature of - 460°F (from Yr.no) with no ability to change to another weather provider. I have the premium versions of other apps from this developer and the Yr.no weather is also wrong in these apps as well.

Love the watchface and all the interactive options however I purchased the premium version to get access to these and to set up custom inicators on my watch and the app shows me having premium but my watch doesn't even after resetting multiple times. Premium does not work.
I like the watch face but it's an entire launcher. So it slows my watch way down. Running 2.17
Very useful all info in one place
Doesn't work with galaxy watch

This is one of two thema faces I use, along with Feisar. I've upgraded both to pro, and will probably end up with more faces soon. I like watch faces that remain active for longer than 5 seconds, this has options of remaining active for up to 30 seconds, it has various colour combinations and lots of configurable interactive apps. A regularly used watch face on my Huawei Watch 2. Keep up the good work.
Thought i had an issue, but turns out i dont know how to read a digital clock :) developer responded and i can confirm app works as expected!

great but would like the option to add agenda/next appointment in place of one or more widgets. widget choices seem limited to me but design is nice. interface on app and watch is intuitive and easy to use. merci

title: Camera One for Samsung Watch
description:
Features:
• Buttons layout styles
• Camera: Rear or Front
• Zoom, Flash, Exposure, WB, Filters, HDR (use bezel)
• Photo / Video sizes
• Timer: 2, 5, 10 secs
• Power saving mode
• Customizable action of Home button
• Save files on SD card

Works even when the phone screen is off!

All settings are available on your smart-watch.

How to change Zoom, Flash, Exposure, WB, Filters, HDR:
Tap on the top of the screen where is written ‘Zoom: x1.0' to change the bezel mode: Zoom > Flash > Exposure > WB > Filter > ...
Then rotate the bezel to select the value.
For flash: rotate the bezel to select the flash mode: auto / on / off / torch

Compatible with:
• Samsung Galaxy Watch
• Samsung Galaxy Watch Active
• Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2
• Samsung Gear S3 Frontier
• Samsung Gear S3 Classic
• Samsung Gear Sport
• Samsung Gear S2

P.S. Thank you for choosing my app and... Enjoy)
comments: The developer is responsive to feedback and frequently updates adding new features and patching bugs. The app works very well and has improved with every update. I highly recommend this app!

A remote camera screen for Galaxy Gear: Have you ever wished to see and control your phone camera remotely? You got it. With this app you can be with your loved ones in the photo without a need for an outsider to take the photo. You take the photo from your watch. With many features in the paid version like flash control. If you have Galaxy watch, this one is a must.

Not really sure WHAT I PAID FOR!!! The features are the same as the free version & the camera screen doesnt even show up on my phone when using the app! Dont like how I cant even turn the flash on my phone or set a timer for longer than 2 seconds!

Awesome app i already told a few of my friends. I think I'll just buy it since its so useful. A great novelty. I really appreciate the responses from the developer after all the other reviews and their insightful suggestions.
Great app, allows you to take photos remotely from your Samsung watch. Developer is continuously updating and improving the app. Highly recommend it.

title: Find My Watch for Android Wear
description:
Find My Watch uses your watch's microphone to transmit what the watch hears to your phone. Just start the app on your phone and call out to your watch! You'll hear your voice on the phone, just keep calling out and walking around until you find it. This method is guaranteed to work every time.

In addition you can choose Flash and Vibrate, which will make your watch vibrate and flash the screen to help you locate it. If your watch has a Speaker, it will also Beep along with the Flashing and Vibrating!

- Find Watch with Microphone and Flashing screen
- Find Watch with Vibrate and Flashing screen
- Find Watch with Vibrate, Beep, and Flashing screen (if watch has a speaker)
- Install app on a Watch that is currently lost!
- Wear 2.0 Remote Install!


(In-App Purchase for donations only)

Note: Only works with Android Wear devices and will not work with others such as Pebble...

** Your wear device must be on and connected to phone via Bluetooth, WiFi, or LTE for this to work **

summary: Use the microphone on your lost Android Wear Watch to help you locate it!
developerAddress:
People Talkin'
1109 Nottingham Dr.
Glen Burnie, MD 21061
comments: Another brilliant Wear OS app from this developer. Have made a donation as fully deserved. Dev, if you're reading this by any chance, I don't suppose you could let me know if you think you'll be able to see about a persistent notification for the Phone/Watch battery app? Many thanks!

Worked perfectly! Remote install took a few minutes, so be patient with that. Once it was installed, I found my list watch within seconds. It had been missing since this morning, and four people were looking/keeping an eye out for it. TEN HOURS LATER i installed this app, and found my watch right away!

This app is lit!!! So I just realize I forgot my smart watch at work yesterday. I know I forgot it there but when I called my coworkers say they didnt see anything. so i looked for a smartwatch tracker and I found this! i've heard one of my co workers voice by using audio. Call them back and make my watch vibrate and alarm and viola they saw my watch!!! amazing app 😍

Does what it says, and well. I installed it on my lost watch (connected but couldn't find it) then chose the find by mic option. Then I stomped around until I could hear my stomping via the watch, headed towards the direction I could tell I was getting louder, then eventually found my watch down in the cushions of the couch! So, thank you!

I'm giving the app 5 stars because it does what it's set out to do by helping people find their lost watch. I lost mine, but was able to download the app remotely from my phone onto my lost watch. You could use 2 features: find by vibrating and flashing or find by using the microphone. the vibrating and flashing was super effective. Didn't realize how hard my watch could vibrate. My only recommendation would be to change the damn font. nothing says sketchy like the font that you guys used.

title: Speeds Watch Face
description:
“Speeds” watch face turns your Android Wear watch into a sporty time machine.

This free analog watch face unites classic sportive design with modern smartwatch functionality. 

It is an iconic custom watchface and a speedometer app at the same time.

★ Sports watch with superb readability
★ Easy to use companion speedometer app
★ Adventurous spirit and exclusive design
★ Customizable Android Wear watch face 
★ Works for round and squared watches 

Watch face functions:

- Classic Wear watch face 
- Battery level indicator 
- Date numerical
- Day of the week

Also check Speeds Pro Version:

- Link to Pro Version: http://goo.gl/j1Wf57
- Speed information
- Compass 
- Step tracker
- Weather
- Second time
- Battery level indicator 
- Date and day of week

Speedometer wear app (how to):

- Tap on the watch face
- Select start menu
- Choose Speeds App
- Speedometer will be opened
- GPS and speed tracking will be activated 

Why does watch face always show 6 mph?

- Please open the integrated speedometer app to get accurate speed information 
- The speed element shown on the watch face is just for design purposes 
- Constant GPS tracking would drain too much battery
- Please be aware that the speedometer app relies on the quality of the GPS signal of your smartphone.  
- Please do not rely on the displayed information. 

Supported devices

- Works on all Android Wear devices 
- Supports round (Moto 360) and rectangular smartwatches (Samsung Gear Live and LG G Watch). 
- Does NOT work on Samsung Gear and smartwatches using other operating systems 

More watch faces

- Visit our exclusive wearface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4
- Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be added to our selection of watch faces. 

Engineered with love in Germany

comments: I loved the look (colours and style) and used the face for some weeks. My Moto 360 2 battery was dying after 8 hours. I thought was the end of life of the watch itself. Changed the face to a standard Moto watch face, 24hrs battery life easy.
Works great. Make the watch show 0 mph when not using for speeds. Mine stays at 6 mph
Nice watchface to add to your collection.
A little hard on battery and notifications cover half of the screen sony smart watch 3
Works well sony watch 3

title: Radii Watch Face for Android Wear OS
description:
The motion of our planet along its orbit and around the sun brings time to pass in our realities. We were quite intrigued by this fact and decided to recreate this idea in our next watchface.

Radii takes inspiration from the dynamics of a planetary system and simulates its workings onto a digital timepiece. The centre—our star—indicates the hour while a sphere carrying the minute rotates around it along its striped orbit. You will also see a tiny moon gliding around this sphere in sync with each stroke of the second hand.

What’s more? The watchface also has a scale that displays your battery life and a crescent that shows the day.


In the event that the watch does not automatically notify you to set up Radii you can manually do so by following these steps: 
• On the watch, press the side button and go to Play Store
• Scroll down until the section "Apps on your phone" appears. You should be able to see Radii listed under this section.
• Under Radii, tap on "Install". Once it is installed, select "Set Watch Face". 


8 Color themes + Customizable color options.

 Android wear smart watch required 

 Compatible with: 
• Moto 360 
• LG Watch Sport
• LG Watch Style
• LG Watch Urbane 
• LG G Watch R 
• LG G Watch 
• Asus ZenWatch 
• Huawei watch
• Sony Smartwatch 3
• Samsung Gear Live 
• Tag Heuer Connected
• Fossil Q Founder
• Fossil Q Marshal
• Fossil Q Wander

or any wearable running Wear OS by Google (Previously known as Android Wear)

More watch faces by The Design Cycle:
• Roto 360
• Tymometer 
• Time Tuner
• Roto Gears


Created by
Gaurav Singh &
Krishna Prajapati

recentChanges: German and Italian translations
comments: Hey guys, you've done a great job with this watch face!! I love the simplicity of it. This is all I use now. I have just one recommendation/request. Could you add the ability to change the brightness of the Ambient Display? I've noticed it's set to full (or very high) brightness and it may be an unnecessary drain to the battery. Thanks so much. Great job!!!
Very well done, good design. Used it exclusively on 2 different watches

Extrememy clean and minimal seen a lot of people complaining that they couldnt apply the watch face to their watch. its a standalone app. install it on your phone and wait a few mins. Then press the "resync apps" button on the wear OS app. it will appear with a notification on your watch saying the app is installed, and there you have it...

After trial and error I decided go online and figure out how to add the watch face to my Fossil Explorer 3. I didn't realize this watch face is a standalone app. What i found worked perfect! -If the screen is dim, press the power button to wake up your watch. -To see your list of apps, press the power button. -Scroll down and tap Play Store . ... -Scroll down and look for the "Apps on your phone" section. -To download the app, tap Install . I can now contol the watch face from my phone app!

Top marks on the design. Easily the best watch face I've seen and absolutely love it. If the developer is reading this. Although this is a great design is there any chance you could add in steps/heart rate and show the battery level in the AOD mode? With this I'd definitely not need another watch face again. Thanks again for the great work 👍

title: Advanced Watch Face & Clock Widget
description:
Advanced Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of Advanced Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-GEN"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

2.2.26.127

comments: Thema faces are among the most customizable faces out there. A couple things could be better: You get a choice of a few backgrounds, and most of them are so dark you can't add much color to them. And no way to use your own backgrounds. The color pallet is a limited dot selector. No custom colors

Great face for Fossil Gen 5. I can finally have all of the shortcuts that I need on the watch face. I have 4 shortcuts and 5 widgets....a lot but the face is still cool looking. The app is super easy and intuitive.

This is a FIRST CLASS app and developer! There are a MULTITUDE of different preferences to choose from, and I am able to create and save exactly the watch face I wanted. I have a Fossil 5th Gen smartwatch, and it looks very sharp with these faces, and functionality. I initially had a question about the interactive buttons, but I e-mailed the developer, and he personally responded to me within a few hours, (on a SUNDAY!). Get the PREMIUM from the start ... it's WELL worth a small "donation "!

This is easily one of the best looking watch faces in the app store! I really like the looks and the layout of this watch face with the exception of one small thing. The battery level for the phone and watch should be just another widget. I'd like to have these two small windows/ circles open for something extra like sunrise on the left and sunset on the right. or some other complication.

love the customization available. feom the widgets to apps that can display on the face. only ever had one issue and that was with the messages app(pixel 3). when i recieved a notification a "1" would appear indicating an unread text but would go away after reading the text. other than that, amazing and thats why im writing this.

title: Chrono Flat HD Watch Face Widget & Live Wallpaper
description:
This completely customizable interactive HD Android Wear / Wear OS Watch Face, Clock Widget & Live Wallpaper brings a classic elegance to your wrist and Launcher. Features include custom complications, battery levels, weather conditions, step counter, color picker & date information. A settings app will also be installed on your mobile device to configure the watch face for any look you desire. Select any color and create a completely custom look for yourself! Don't have an Android Wear watch? No Problem! You can use the clock widget or Live Wallpaper on your launcher!


💡IMPORTANT - Not compatible with Samsung Smart Watches that use Tizen or smartwatches with other operating systems than Android Wear. Please also note that as this is an HD watch face, the file is a bit larger and can take up to 5 minutes to transfer to your watch. This is normal.

★Basic Features★
✔ Launcher Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
✔ Live Wallpaper
✔ Customizable digital & or analog clock
✔ Interactive Actions (Digital, Date)
✔ Time zone selection
✔ Custom date format picker
✔ Smooth second hand
✔ 24-Hour
✔ Burn-In protection

★Premium Features★
✔ Custom Complications (Android Wear 2.0)
✔ Widget Frames
✔ Live Wallpaper (Animated Seconds)
✔ Screen Modes (Normal, Always Ambient, Always On)
✔ Screen on Time selection
✔ Interactive Actions (Weather, Step Counter)
✔ Peek card size selector
✔ Ambient modes selector
✔ Screen on-time selector
✔ Color picker to select any color you like for the background, clock hands, text, & numbers
✔ Save personal color themes (long press to delete theme)
✔ Clock numbers toggle
✔ Watch battery status
✔ Phone battery status (When connected to an Android Phone)
✔ Current date
✔ Step Counter
✔ Weather conditions (Yahoo Weather & OpenWeatherMap) (When connected to an Android Phone)

★Translations★
✔ English
✔ Chinese
✔ Czech
✔ Dutch
✔ French
✔ German
✔ Italian
✔ Japanese
✔ Korean
✔ Russian
✔ Spanish

★How to install★
Watch Face - Once you have installed from the Play store, you may be asked to grant permissions to the app on your phone - be sure to approve all permissions. Once the app has installed on your phone, it may take 5-10 minutes to transfer over to you watch and the Android Wear app. Please be patient. Once installed, simply long press on your watch face to bring up the selection menu, or select this watchface from the Android Wear app. Use the accompanying settings app to configure the settings and options

Widget - Depending on what launcher you are using, you can either long press on your launcher to place a widget, or select this widget from the App Drawer -> Widgets list. Customize and change the widget settings with the accompanying App.

Live Wallpaper - Depending on what launcher you are using, you can either long press on your launcher to select your Wallpaper, or you can select the Live Wallpaper from the Settings App

If you have any problems at all, please send me an email before leaving a negative review - I will do my best to fix the issue as soon as possible.

★Trouble Shooting★
http://deniteappz.com/watchface/troubleshooting.html

Stay tuned for more watch faces to come!

★Google+ Community★
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/117849705573164164003/communities/106226068177418863967

title: Black Classic Watch Face
description:
Black Classic Watch Face is fully compatible with Android Wear 2.0 and is compatible with all Android Wear watches

★ Android Wear 2.0 integrated features
• external complication support
• fully standalone
• iPhone compatible

Black Classic Watch Face has a classic look and is build for using every day, it simplified many use cases such as launching programs, setting brightness and listening music.

The application is absolutely free and it has core options, but you can purchase the PREMIUM version with a lot of features and options.

FREE version includes:
★ Choosing from solid or gradient background color
★ Own launcher
★ Own remote music control
★ Ability to change screen brightness from launcher
★ Weather forecast for current day
★ Detailed information of watch battery and phone battery
★ Google Fit data for current day

PREMIUM version includes:
★ All features from FREE version
★ Endless background colors
★ Weather forecast for upcoming hours and days
★ Detailed Google Fit data for current day and last 7 days
★ Set two shortcuts with predefined views or actions
★ Choosing from three clock dial types
★ Choosing from three hand color types (Black, White, Accent)
★ Choosing from four battery indicator types
★ Choosing from three Google Fit indicator types
★ Set smooth seconds
★ Ability to change Keep watches screen awake interval
★ Ability to change Weather update interval
★ Ability to change Weather provider

The configuration in companion application contains:
★ Time and date format according to phone settings (12/24)
★ Enable touch feedback
★ Ability to set Grayscale Ambient mode for OLED displays
★ Show/Hide Battery indicator
★ Show/Hide Google Fit indicator
★ Show/Hide Weather indicator
★ Ability to change temperature units
★ Ability to change wind speed units
★ Information about last weather update

The HuskyDEV Black Classic Watch Face works great with squared and round watches.

For using Google Fit data in Black Classic Watch Face, you must confirm dialog on start, that application can read data from your phone.

Common synchronization problem solution:

If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:
- uninstall the face application from the phone
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Black Classic Watch Face once again

summary: Interactive watch face with cool features like launcher or remote music control
recentChanges:
Fix:
- The Sun/Rise information is not working on some time zones
comments: My 1st downloaded watch face app on my TicW E2. I paid $2.79 for a full version. Love the analog looks with all its useful complications options/areas. Some observations: (a) top shortcuts icons are too small to see or accurately tap on; (b) phone app has an UI layout, where the settings contents seem categorically unorganized; (c) watch battery lasts about 12hrs (while other similarly complications-loaded watch faces last 14-15hrs).

I never thought I'd be willing to pay for a watch face app, but this one feels well worth it. It looks great, but above all I love how many apps you can assign to shortcuts. It also has some great built-in functions like a phone finder and flashlight switch.

Excellent. Has every function needed including hourly chirp and disconnection buzz which I've never found on any other app. All functions are available from the watch face and can be set to suit your requirements. This app has everything. Actually one star off for the date. Top or middle its impossible to read. It's needs to be available as a number only positioned centre right. Or available in one of the function positions.

This watch face can be customized extensively. Most features can be managed from your phone. By being able to disable certain display items for always on, the battery lasts much better when using always on. Really works well.

Guys what happenned to real.weather reborn??? It was the only watch face i honestly liked i even payed money to unlock the features it.worked.great until recently when the the weather said it.was.mi us 460 degrees and my step count was way off so i took ot off and tried to reload it but it wouldnt reload then i started lookong everywhere for.it nowhere so now what? I got.screwed?? I mean i PAYED for that and now its wiped off the the best face you had in my opinion is now gone anreally that sux

title: Chrono24
description:
With the Chrono24 app, you can hold the fascinating world of luxury watches in your hand. Find your new watch among over 400,000 listings from more than 20,000 verified dealers and private sellers.

Exclusive for app users:
• The world of luxury watches optimized for your smartphone
• Identify watches with a single photo using the Watch Scanner
• Notifications about new listings or price changes
• Communicate with others directly in the app



BUYER PROTECTION
Our free Chrono24 Buyer Protection offers you added security: Verified dealers, payment via an escrow account, and an Authenticity Guarantee.

WATCH SCANNER
Identify watches with a single image: Our Watch Scanner tool lets you discover information about a watch and its market value from a single photo.
All you have to do is take a picture of a watch on someone's wrist, in a shop window, or even in a magazine.
You can then search for that model on Chrono24, sell it, or add it to your digital Watch Collection.

WATCH COLLECTION
Wear one watch on your wrist and keep the rest tucked away safely in your pocket: Our Watch Collection tool lets you manage your personal collection in the Chrono24 app. Discover your watches' current estimated value and keep an eye on their performance – all on your smartphone.

WATCH NEWS
Stay up to date and receive behind-the-scenes reports from the most popular watch blogs – directly in the app.



ABOUT CHRONO24
Chrono24 has been the global online marketplace for luxury watches since 2003. People from all over the world use the platform to buy and sell watches from prestigious brands, such as Rolex, Omega, Breitling, Panerai, and IWC, as well as unique and vintage watches from small, independent manufacturers.
Our support team is always just a phone call or email away. They are available to help all Chrono24 users and always appreciate your honest feedback. Please send any suggestions or feedback to mobile@chrono24.com.

recentChanges:
- Selling Watches – You'll now find everything about your listings under the menu item "Sell."

comments: I have to go back to the home page to search instead of just straight up being able to use the search box provided while in the search results page for other watches (pressing enter does nothing). This is a simple fix, and yet I've never seen a sinhle update since downloading to fix such an issue. Put this into 1 star because I do not believe the chrono24 developers are putting anymore effort towards the app.

I was excited to use this app to track the value of my collection, but it has been more of a struggle than it's worth. I can find watches I own that are posted for sale, but "can't be found" when trying to add them to my collection. If I can't add my watches on the app, why even have the feature? I've also noticed prices are often listed significantly higher than I can find brand new on other sites. Overall disappointing. Edit: Don't send canned responses to negative feedback. Fix your app.
New update made more in-app changes. However, the Add to Notepad (❤️) is broken and always shows 0 (while the web version is working). Also, there's still some pages referred back to the Web.
Cool app. Great source to compare prices. I would like to be able to copy and paste. Example: copy product number and search for it. You can't do that. I will not submit feedback to another website.
Very easy to use. Explore different watches before making the right purchase.

title: Watch Face Z01 Android Wear
description:
Z01 is a Premium watch face with 16.7 million colours to choose from.

This watch face is designed to run on round and square Android Wear watches.

FEATURES / SETTINGS:
- Interactive
- Any colour
- Date and time
- Battery power
- Dimmed mode for extended battery life (black display)
- Low battery usage
- Notification settings
- Screen timeout settings

This app supports all Android Wear watches including:
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 2
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 SPORT
- MOTOROLA MOTO WOMAN
- ASUS ZENWATCH
- ASUS ZENWATCH 2
- ASUS ZENWATCH 3
- SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
- LG G 
- LG G WATCH R
- LG URBANE 1ST AND 2ND GEN (NOT LTE)
- SONY SMARTWATCH 3
- HUAWEI 
- FOSSIL Q FOUNDER
- FOSSIL Q MARSHAL
- FOSSIL Q WANDER
- TAG HEUER CONNECTED
- MICHAEL KORS
- NIXON MISSION
- CASIO SMART OUTDOOR WATCH
- POLAR M600

INSTALLATION
- After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the smartwatch. It will take a few minutes for the watch to sync. You will see a pop up message on the watch when it's ready.
- You can activate the watch face from the Android Wear app or by long press on the watch.

IF THE WATCH FACE DOES NOT APPEAR:
- Check your watch device is connected in Android Wear app on phone.
- Make sure you have waited a few minutes for the watch to sync the new face on phone.
- If all else fails you can try restarting the phone / watch or reinstalling the app.

HELP AND RATINGS
- Email us if you need help, have questions, or suggestions. forzaonestudios@gmail.com  Thanks!

Please leave your comments & ratings!

You can also contact us by email or social media.

Google+:    https://plus.google.com/100824301362224146192
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Luxury-watch-faces-for-smartwatches/1520318818182092
Twitter:      https://twitter.com/Forza_One
Email:       ForzaOneStudios@gmail.com

recentChanges: Made process smoother for people who download License app before main app.
comments: Love the concept and I made a really cool watch face with it. However, if you have a Samsung Galaxy watch, it does not connect to Samsung Health and the application functionality is extremely inaccurate. This includes Steps, Heart Rate, Weather and distance. I spent the money on the Premium application and the Samsung Companion application. You don't find out until you have a bunch of time invested that it is not going to work. Please don't respond with the forum websites, been there, done that and it still doesn't work. Resetting the watch and the phone only to get erroneous information does not seem very efficient to me.

App doesn't work all of a sudden. I had it installed on my LG G8x and it worked perfectly fine until a few months ago. It told me I didn't have the premium version when I did. I contacted the creators and received no answer. So I'm giving up after this last attempt. I'll be requesting a refund.

I paid the $7.99 for Premium. Yesterday I was able to add watch faces to my watch. Today they all say can't connect with watch. I have Bluetooth on the phone & watch. I uninstalled watchmaker and reinstalled. It didn't ask to re-pair it, but says it's activated. I have a watchmaker watch face showing and it will not send the new watch faces to the Fossil Gen 5 watch.

Don't bother paying for premium, they say it's "ad free" but it's not, you still get pop up ads and you also get ads uploaded directly to your camera gallery. Aside from the annoying and invasive ads the app works decently although their animated watch faces are lacking in diversity and functionality (many animated faces freeze or crash within minutes of use). Bottom line, don't spend your money on this, use the free service as is because there isn't any behavior difference between them.

Great app for making your own watch faces, and has lots of pre-made choices available. The only issue I have run into is that the weather info does not update reliably. Even setting a tap action to update it does not cause an actual update, it just changes the "last updated" time.

title: Galaxy Watch Plugin
description:
This application is a component for Galaxy Wearable Application. 
Galaxy Wearable Application has to be installed in advance.

※ Please allow the permission of Galaxy Wearable Application from Android Settings to use it completely in Android 6.0.
Settings > Apps > Galaxy Watch Plugin > Permissions

※ Access rights information 
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Required permissions]
- Location: Used to search for nearby devices for Watch through Bluetooth
- Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with Watch
- Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plug-in apps
- Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information
- Calendar : Used to synchronize schedule with Watch
- SMS : Used to synchronize SMS with Watch

[Optional permissions]
- Camera : Used to scan the QR code to activate Watch's SIM card(eSIM Support Model only)

title: Everyday Digital Watch Face
description:
Everyday for Android Wear is digital watch face with big digits and second indicator.

*** This watch face was designed for Android Wear 1.x so the time is off center to allow for display of peeking notification cards. Please see the successor "Just Time" watch face that is clean, yet powerful (complications support), designed for Android Wear 2: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.brouken.wear.face.justtime ***

Its main purpose is to quickly read time in a glance with higher than minute resolution - so this watch updates time every 20 seconds instead of only once a minute.

The extra screen updates doesn't result in any noticeable battery drain (no more than 5%). It also works and looks great on Sony SmartWatch 3 thanks to transflective lcd. It is not suitable (burn-in protection may not be enough) for OLED.

There are some configurable options: 12/24 hour modes, white on black or inverted, font size and typeface, font outline (because of background support), and few other things to toggle (date, seconds, top ambient battery line).

Everyday Watch Face also allows you to have custom clock background. Just share any image on your phone with "Everyday Watch Face" and it will be set as the background.

comments: Large bold font - zoomable to 120% - is exactly what I need as my ability to focus closely deminishes with age! Simple, uncomplicated, effective. Looks great on a Sony Smart Watch 3, making good use of the screen shape and available space. Only suggestion - and this is really nit-picking! - is for the time and date to be moved down the screen a little, to prove a bit more of a gap between them and the other info (battery charge symbol, battery charge value, and seconds). Great app. Love it!
One of best watch face working amazingly. One cons is that the connectvity icon in watch to phone is not displayed.dont know whether it is conceted to phone or not. But worth having this watch face.
Most watch face apps required location access. This one doesn't. Thank you. Simple & functional.

I didn't expect to say this for a free app but this is a well customisable watch face app with plenty of functionality and switchability! I would donate if it had a PayPal or Patreon page 😃. And meaningful patch notes too 😍
Nice, simply watch face.  Only complaint, when the screen goes to ambient, the seconds need to go away as well.

title: 3D HD Watch Face
description:
By installing "3D HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.

Some of the options and features are: 
 ✔ Minimalistic design & Stylish look
 ✔ Phone disconnection vibration
 ✔ Different watch vibration modes
 ✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock
 ✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modes

Supported devices:
 ✔ Motorola Moto 360
 ✔ LG G Watch
 ✔ LG G Watch R
 ✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2)
 ✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
 ✔ Asus ZenWatch

Does NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen.	

Never leave your phone behind ANYMORE!!!

With a single tap you can enable the option to let your wrist vibrate whenever the connection between your phone and your Android Wear device gets disconnected.

How to install:
 - Long press on your Android Wear device and select this watchface from the carousel.
 - You can also select our watchface from the Android Wear App.

If you don't see it in the carousel:
 - Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device to sync.
 - Lauch Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps" and wait for resync.

Visit our other watchfaces and apps at: http://goo.gl/kxZzQA

Have an idea on how to improve the app?Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best to make you happy.

title: Watch Active2 Plugin
description:
This application is a component for Galaxy Wearable Application. 
Galaxy Wearable Application has to be installed in advance.

※ Please allow the permission of Galaxy Wearable Application from Android Settings to use it completely in Android 6.0.
Settings > Apps > Watch  Active Plugin > Permissions

※ Access rights information 
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Required permissions]
- Location: Used to search for nearby devices for Watch through Bluetooth
- Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with Watch
- Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plug-in apps
- Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information
- Calendar : Used to synchronize schedule with Watch
- SMS : Used to synchronize SMS with Watch

[Optional permissions]
- Camera : Used to scan the QR code to activate Watch's SIM card(eSIM Support Model only)

title: Marine Digital Watch Face & Clock Live Wallpaper
description:
✭✭✭ NEW UPDATE! ✭✭✭

Please follow these steps in that order to fix the synchronization problems. 

1 ) From phone 

- Uninstall and reinstall Primary on your phone 
- Open the app and login to your Google Fit account (grant all permission)

2) From Smartwatch

- Update Primary on your Smartwatch
- Login to fit account (If already logged in, log out and log in again)


Marine Digital Interactive Watch Face !!  A Unique Military Style Watch face and Clock Live Wallpaper with Hourly Chime Sound effect, Touch Sound Effects and many Interactive Features for Phones and Wear OS 2.0.
 


★Tap Features (*Available Only in Premium Version)

❖ Tap on "CENTER" of Watch face to change colors of watch face with Touch.
❖ Tap on "STOPWATCH" on Upper Left corner of Watch face for Interactive Stop watch.
❖ Tap on "MENU" on Upper Right corner of Watch face for Apps Launcher Menu.
❖ Tap on "FLASH" on Lower Right corner of Watch face for Flashlight App.
❖ Tap on "TIMER" on Lower Left corner of Watch face for Timer App.
❖ Tap on "DATE" on Lower Side of Watch face for Agenda App.
❖ Tap on "WEATHER" on main Watch Face to get 4 days Weather Forecast and Other Weather Info.
❖ Tap on "STEPS" to Get Google Fit Data

❖ Double Tap on "LIVE WALLPAPER" to Speak the Time and Change the colors



❖ Watch Face Fusion is fully compatible with Wear OS 2.0 (Android Wear)

❖ Android Wear (Wear OS) 2.0 integrated Features:
• Fully standalone
• iPhone and Android compatible



❖ Marine Digital is fully Compatible with all Android Wear watches resolutions.


💡IMPORTANT - Not compatible with Samsung Smart Watches that use Tizen OS.

 
❖ Free Version

❖ Unique Military Style Digital Watch Face.
❖ Wear OS 2.0 Fully supported.
❖ Standalone watch face for iPhone and Android users.
❖ Current Weather info
❖ Clock Live Wallpaper with Limited Settings
❖ Watch Battery Info
❖ Date, Day, Month 



❖ Premium Version Features

❖ All features from FREE version.
❖ Wear OS 2.0 Third Party Complications Support.
❖ Hourly Chime Sound effect and Vibration on every hour
❖ Touch Sound Effect and Touch Vibration.
❖ 15 Predefined watch face Colors Combinations, Changes on tap
❖ Unique Military Style Digital Watch Face and Clock Live Wallpaper.
❖ 11 Live Wallpaper Backgrounds
❖ Custom Colors For Interactive & Ambient Mode
❖ Interactive Stop Watch For Sports Activity
❖ App Launcher Menu
❖ Your Custom Name on Watch Face (Change Watch Face Settings)
❖ Weather Forecast for Next 4 Days, High/Low Temp, Wind Speed, Sunset/Sunrise info
❖ GPS or Manually Select Weather Location Option for Correct Weather
❖ Fully Accurate Pedometer with Google Fit 
❖ Switch Between Phone and Watch battery with one Touch
❖ Screen Bright Time Option
❖ Special Design For Moto 360 (Flat Tire)
 





❖How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 1.0?

1. After install run 'Re-sync app' from the Android Wear app
2. Long press your watch and choose "Marine Digital Watch Face" as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app



❖How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 2.0?

1. Install it from Google Play Wear Store on your watch
2. Install the companion app for fully customization (Android phone devices)


❖Useful Tip
✔ Sometimes you need to wait longer for transfer to watch
✔I recommend a bit of patience .
✔This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after few minutes, to try re-sync or follow these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face

  
❖Our Wear face collection https://goo.gl/RxW9Cs

IMPORTANT NOTE:Your watch Must have speaker to get Sound Effects

NOTE:if any problem first email us before leaving a 1 star rating on Play Store

title: Primary Watch Face
description:
NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2/S3 – NO TIZEN COMPATIBILITY 
Not compatible on Sony Smartwatch 3

✭✭✭ NEW UPDATE! ✭✭✭

 Please follow these steps in that order to fix the synchronization problems. 

1 ) From phone 

- Uninstall and reinstall Primary on your phone 
- Open the app and login to your Google Fit account (grant all permission)

2)  From Smartwatch

- Update Primary on your Smartwatch
- Login to fit account (If already logged in, log out and log in again)

✭✭✭ Primary watch face. A clean, graphic and interactive app. ✭✭✭

 ✭✭✭ A significant modification of the User Interface (UI) and design has been made. Let us detail below the reason of this change.

The previous version used to display the number of missed calls and SMS. A new Google Policy now prohibits the access to these information. For this reason, we have modified the UI to comply with the new restrictions while keeping a top quality design.

Let us stress that though the system used to allow developers to access the number of missed messages and calls, it never let anyone gain access to the /content/ of these personal data. ✭✭✭


Our first fully digital watch face, thought to look at all the informations you need at a glance.

This watch face focuses on readability and essential features. 

Primary watch face, your best daily partner !

Make your smartwatch look awseome with this minimal swiss design. 


Swiss made watch faces created by experienced watch designers. 
Check http://www.white-group.com/


Premium features and settings

•	Missed notifications
•	WearOS complications
•	Battery consumption graph
•	Activity tracker
•	Additional modes
o	Alarm
o	Timer
o	Chronograph


Free features and settings

•	Time (Hours Minutes Seconds)
•	Battery Level
•	Date
•	Day of the week
•	Adjustable display time – may increase battery consumption 


Companion app

Our dedicated companion app lets you fully operate your smartwatch from your phone. Change the aspect and the function of your device to match your very needs.

•	Settings
o	Display
o	Weather
o	Google fit

Specifications

•	Optimized for low battery consumption
•	Developed for Wear 2.0
•	NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2/S3 – NO TIZEN COMPATIBILITY
•	No ads


 Installation

Primary Watch Face needs to be installed on both watch and phone in order to have access to all complications.

Wear OS 2.0 – from your smartwatch

1.	Open the playstore app via your wear device
2.	Download and install the watch face
3.	Long press and swipe right to « add more watch faces »
4.	Select your new watch face
5.	Be super connected

 Tip 1 - How to unlock premium version 

Enter the settings menu. Navigate down the very end of the list. You’ll find the option “buy premium”. 


Wear 1.x & 2.0 – from your phone 

1.	Open the playstore app via your phone
2.	Make sure phone is connected to your wear device 
3.	Download and install the watch face on your phone
4.	Within seconds/minutes the watch face will appear on your wear device
5.	Welcome to the future

 Tip 2 - Companion app 

Once downloaded on the phone, open the app and grant the required permissions. Make sure you have Google Fit installed on both phone and watch. 


 Should you experience any problem please contact us instead of smashing us. 
We will get in touch with you asap.

- Update Primary on your Smartwatch
- Login to fit account (If already logged in, log out and log in again)

✭✭✭ Primary watch face. A clean, graphic and interactive app. ✭✭✭

✭✭✭ A significant modification of the User Interface (UI) and design has been made. Let us detail below the reason of this change.

The previous version used to display the number of missed calls and SMS. A new Google Policy now prohibits the access to these information. For this reason, we have modified the UI to comply with the new restrictions while keeping a top quality design.

Let us stress that though the system used to allow developers to access the number of missed messages and calls, it never let anyone gain access to the /content/ of these personal data. ✭✭✭


Our first fully digital watch face, thought to look at all the informations you need at a glance.

This watch face focuses on readability and essential features.

Primary watch face, your best daily partner !

Make your smartwatch look awseome with this minimal swiss design.


Swiss made watch faces created by experienced watch designers.
Check http://www.white-group.com/


Premium features and settings

• Missed notifications
• WearOS complications
• Battery consumption graph
• Activity tracker
• Additional modes
o Alarm
o Timer
o Chronograph


Free features and settings

• Time (Hours Minutes Seconds)
• Battery Level
• Date
• Day of the week
• Adjustable display time – may increase battery consumption


Companion app

Our dedicated companion app lets you fully operate your smartwatch from your phone. Change the aspect and the function of your device to match your very needs.

• Settings
o Display
o Weather
o Google fit

Specifications

• Optimized for low battery consumption
• Developed for Wear 2.0
• NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2/S3 – NO TIZEN COMPATIBILITY
• No ads


Installation

Primary Watch Face needs to be installed on both watch and phone in order to have access to all complications.

Wear OS 2.0 – from your smartwatch

1. Open the playstore app via your wear device
2. Download and install the watch face
3. Long press and swipe right to « add more watch faces »
4. Select your new watch face
5. Be super connected

Tip 1 - How to unlock premium version

Enter the settings menu. Navigate down the very end of the list. You’ll find the option “buy premium”.


Wear 1.x & 2.0 – from your phone

1. Open the playstore app via your phone
2. Make sure phone is connected to your wear device
3. Download and install the watch face on your phone
4. Within seconds/minutes the watch face will appear on your wear device
5. Welcome to the future

Tip 2 - Companion app

Once downloaded on the phone, open the app and grant the required permissions. Make sure you have Google Fit installed on both phone and watch.


Should you experience any problem please contact us instead of smashing us.
We will get in touch with you asap.
summary: Digital watchface with minimal design providing you with essential informations.
developerAddress:
Sooon SA
Rue St-Honoré 10
2000 Neuchâtel
Switzerland
recentChanges:
- Reduced battery consumption
- Improved overall performance
- Improved the promotion management
comments: This is the best looking watch faced I have ever used, HOWEVER... this thing runs down my battery in just a couple of hours! Is there anything you guys can do to fix this???
Watch doesn't install, website not working... Thanks for replying. Working now.

It's a beautiful watch face. I love nearly everything about it. The downfall is that it seems to kill my watch battery. At the end of the day my battery is usually around 20% with pretty much any watch face I use. When I use the primary watch face, I can't even make it a day. It usually dies 3 to 4 hours before I normally take it off.

Beautiful watch face and very generous free offering by the developer actually. Was tempted to get the premium but would not because of two things. Actually sort of a deal breaker. 1. Although the watchface is gorgeous, it needs a better ambient mode, the currently tiny text is not particularly useful of stylish. It makes it feel like the display is smaller than it is, maybe a circle around the edges etc could help emphasize the size of the display and 2. Google fit data wouldn't show up.
Nice utility for SmartWatch.

comments: It doesnt even show up in apps or give the option to open after install, is this some sort of scam or something. You can only install/ uninstall not able to open

PROS: *You can customize the color of the watch (the numbers, not the background, which is alright for me) *I love the date format (mm/dd/yyyy) *ambient mode is very subtle; limits the possibility of burns and conserves battery CONS: slow to respond when touched. from the ambient mode, I use to touch the screen for easier visibility of the time, but I think it responds slowly (takes around 1-2 seconds). Hopefully you'll address this with updates. Thanks again!!
Love it! Good job, thx!! Excellent 4 in cinema, non intrusive looks fantastic on my Tic watch Proa

I really rate the simplicity of this face, but possibly the lack of an explanation that the phone app doesn't actually clutter the home screen, but instead embeds in the Wear OS app would be advisable (i actually think this feature is a strength, so make more of it!). Really great app and watch face.

I had the same issue as Quemodo accessing the settings, but in my case on a Sony Xperia Z5. I then discovered that they can be adjusted through the android wear application. great appearance that I really enjoy, slightly let down by the difficulty to access personalisation.

title: Ultra Watch Face
description:
★ Ultra Watch Face is fully  Wear OS  2.0 supported

NEW! Completely new redesigned Ultra watch face!. A nice, clean and interactive real watch face with Premium upgrade option. You can always use it for free and it has core options, but Premium version comes with lot more features and options.

★  How to select shortcuts in the position (complication)  ★

- Long tap on the watch face
- System shows icon "gear" for the watch face settings. Tap on it
- Select "Customize" option
- Select "Complications" option
- Select desired position
- Select "External Complication"
- Find "General" from list and select it
- Select "App shortcut" and choose desired app
You are ready to go.

★  New version replaces shortcuts with external complications  ★
New version replaces old built-in shortcuts with external complications (in watch settings ) which gives to the user more options to show on the watch face (f.e. shortcuts for all installed apps on the watch, system data like as day\nights sunlights, time zones, weather, and much more)

★ Wear OS  2.0 integration
  • Fully standalone! (iPhone and Android compatible)
  • External complication data for the indicators

 ★  Compatible with all WearOS smartwatches
     • External complications
     • Background types
     • Change color 
     • 24 hour format
     • Leading zero
     • Screen time
     • Forecast
     • Full ambient mode option
     • Change a color preset on tap
     • Tap indicator
     •  Google FIT integration
     •  Weather settings (location, providers, frequency update, units)

★ NEW option ★
     •  Vibrate on every hour

  Built-in complications:
    • Steps
    • Distance
    • Walking
    • Running
    • Biking
    • Calories
    • Fit statistics
    • Water counter
    • Coffee counter
    • HeartRate detector
    • Steps counter from wear device (built-in steps)
    • App shortcuts (Timer, Alarm, Flashlight, Stopwatch, Google Map, Find My Phone, Google Keep, Google Translate)
   

★ FAQ
!! Please contact us if you have any trouble with the app !! 
richface.watch@gmail.com

How do I install the watch face on Wear OS 2.0?
1. Install it from Google Play Wear Store on your  watch. 
2. Install the companion app for fully customization (Android phone devices).

Why I can not see steps or activity data in a built-in complication?
 To see steps and other fit data, you need to connect the app with Google Fit.
 There are two options:
     1. Connect to Google Fit via settings located on your smartwatch
     2. Connect to Google Fit via settings located on the phone companion app (only for Android phone devices)

The watch face CANNOT be installed on smartwatches with TizenOS (Samsung Gear 2, 3, ..) or any other OS except WearOS 

★Note: New version doesn't include SMS and Call options due to Google SMS and Call permission rules. 
You can find more info here: 
https://www.xda-developers.com/google-play-developer-policy-call-log-sms/

★ PERMISSIONS Explained
http://www.richface.watch/privacy.php

recentChanges:
After we carefully read all your feedbacks, we decided to revert back some of functionalities:
- Old backgrounds (Legacy)
- Phone battery indicator
- Shortcuts Timer, Alarm, Flashlights, Stopwatch, Google Map, Find My Phone, Google Keep, Google Translate
