comments: Does not even work from the start. Can't set anything, keeps me in the loop between this app and Google play store. Watch faces look usable but app is horrible. Reinstalled the app twice. Tic watch pro 4g

I installed this watch face on my Misfit Vapor and it works wonderfully. It is one of my favorite watch faces. I love its design, looks and functionality! I am able to use my external complication from xDrip to display my blood sugar values. Thank you!

Update! This is awesome customer service! Updated release brings back the functionality I missed. Kudos to the developer for doing this. Would be nice to have more control over the colors of the numbers on the dial. Is this, too, a Google limitation? Old release -- Yet another user not happy with latest update. Why, why, why, must coders insist on fixing what is not broken. Where is the premium option? Where is the phone battery status?

Rating would have been 4 stars, however, update said fixes crash but also took away functionality - specifically phone charge meter, tap to change color, weather says 0 degF and sunny, but it is 48 degF and dark out (10 PM). It took some time to find the face I liked. I've had it since I got the watch 3 years ago. Time to look for another one.

Loving this watch face app on my new Fossil Sport with Wear OS.  Has more than I imagined I could get on a great looking screen.    I'm all in on Google Services so I especially like the shortcuts and colored icons which remind me of Google colors.    Maps and Keep were not working but then I guessed that those apps needed to be installed on the watch.  Sure enough after installing everything is working great.  Cannot believe I can actually create a note and reminder right on the watch.    Really great app, can't say enough about it and well worth the cost.  J

title: Hex Watch Face & Clock Widget
description:
Hex Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of Hex Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-GEN"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

summary: Hex Watch Face is an interactive digital watch face with 8 data to display
recentChanges:
2.2.26.117
★This release needs an update of the application on your watch!★
Added distance, calories, weekofyear, caffeine & water counter data
Added new ambient mode colors
Updated theme of settings mobile
Improved data & full ambient mode battery usage
Option to force english on date
Updated Google Play Services revision
Complete refactoring of the code
If you have any issue, please let me know by email at thema.apps@gmail.com
comments: Out of the many apps here I chose this one because I like the look and features. But, the main reason i want one aside from the clock is for the step counter and I have not been able to get it to work. Even after trying the instruction. If I could get that working I would consider 4 stars.

The free version limits many of the features so you may find it difficult to get a feel for how good this watch face really is. The upgrade to premium is a voluntary value and the developer has mentioned in other replies that any value unlocks all features. The widget and display customization has enough options to impress and is well worth the financial support. This is my second watch face from Thema and I'm pleased with the app and the quick response from the developer.
02/26 - Very unique style watchface.. functional and accurate. I only have Thema watchfaces on my watch. :)

App/watch face is good; hex is not really my forte. Developer has other great watch faces, I went premium on a few of my favorites. Of course nearly all watch face apps have a free and 'paid' version. You don't want to pay... Don't. Move on, but don't bash the developer for doing the standard thing.

A+++ everything it says and so much more just enough important info even tho just 1 spot more would be perfect lol but great face easy app worth the donation use everyday along with his other faces great developer

title: WatchMaster - Watch Face
description:
WatchMaster is a top watch background application designed by our finest designer group that set out to elevate the aesthetic standards of smartphone and smartwatch devices with its unrivaled design quality!  


 Hello watch holders and lovers! We are a group called WatchMaster. 
Our application contains a marvelous collection of watchfaces(watch backgrounds) crafted by our finest and certified global designers. 

Over 400+ high quality watchfaces(watch backgrounds) and features will bring a unique experience to every smartphone and smartwatch users. Not to mention, we release new premium watchfaces(watch backgrounds) every week. 


 Supporting devices  
If you are a smartphone user, please feel free to skip this part! 
WatchMaster supports all of the Android wear OS AND Tizen OS devices.
Such as Huawei, LG, Fossil, New Balance, Moto 360, Sony, Asus Zen, Tag Heuer, 
Samsung Gear S2, S3, Sports and the list goes on! 

** But if you are a Samsung Gear user, you must download ‘WatchMaster for Tizen’, 
a supporting application to use WatchMaster. (This information will be given in our ‘Help’ section.)


 Location and Health information permission required! 
Some of our watchfaces(watch backgrounds) have weather and health features. 
To display the correct information, permission is mandatory to access those data. 
But please do not worry! We are not saving them in our server and only use it to display the information certain watchfaces(watch backgrounds) requires. 


 Other permissions required! 
[Read_External_Storage] In order to bring up the download watchface/livewatch preview file we need permission to read the device's external storage. 
[Write_External_Storage] In order to save the downloaded watchface/livewatch preview and load them we need access to save the data in your storage. 
[Gallery access permission] In order to customize Livewatch background from your Gallery we need your permission to bring up the gallery images for you to edit the Livewatch. But note this information will not be saved on our server. 
[Access_Fine_Location] Location permission is necessary in order to use the weather, GMT watchfaces and Livewatch contents. 


 Preview and Customization 
Before purchase, you can peek of how the watchfaces will work on your devices and 
try customizing the watchfaces(watch backgrounds) to your taste! (Trust me, you will have so much fun :P) 


 WatchMaster Pro?  
You might wonder what WatchMaster Pro might be. 
It’s a subscription for WatchMaster which will let you have access to 
all of our wonderful watchfaces(watch backgrounds)  for a pretty cheap price.


 Anymore updates? 
Yes! Even though our application currently looks like it’s updating, but believe me, 
our team is working hard to bring the best experiences to you guys.
So please make sure to send us a lot of suggestion you might have!! 
We will do our best to develop and have operate for better support :^) 

Or if you just want to say hello, contact us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com

comments: I was using this app on my galaxy s8 with my galaxy watch and it was working fine. I recently bought galaxy s10 lite. I am not able to find this app on my galaxy watch and when I search for this app on galaxy store I am not able to find this app. So Ism not able to use this with my galaxy watch. Please see if you can fix this as I like this app as they is lots of watch faces to choose from. Currently I will be give this rating. If the issue is fixed I will give it a 5 star.
Horrible I have a DZ09 smartwatch and guess what. It won't work. It is only comparable with android and other watches. Please fix this and I will reconsider to rate it 5 stars
No updates and you can see designers pulling away from the app. For instance, DesignerKang only left with one watch face?
When the watch restarts, the watch face is missing some data. Solution is to switch to different face and reapply old one for data to show again.

title: X-Force Watch Face
description:
X-Force Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of X-Force Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-FORCE"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

comments: The best, even some free widget clocks with the 'second' hand too are fine. Keep it up. Hope ensure the correct time always. Add few more such, different attractive "widget clocks (free) with the second hand/s". Thnx.

Only just downloaded. Loved the free version so got the full version. So far it's pretty good. I have a couple of other watch faces where I can open and read emails and texts directly from the watchface. This doesn't seem to work but I guess it's not a big issue. So far so good.

It's good , but few issues need to rectify 1. Font of second time zone is very small , it is very difficult to read it , so FONT TYPE and SIZE of second time zone and DATE should be adjustable. Since we are getting analog watch display, so there should be an option to remove digital watch, it will also give space to increase font size of second time zone. 3. If possible please add hourly stats of weather forecast for at least next 3 to 4 hours in place of logo X-FORCE.
Love it! Customisable, easy to see even with my bad eyes. Great job!
Great to see and read and I love how it shows the battery level of both the watch and the phone...

title: Watch Active Plugin
description:
This application is a component for Galaxy Wearable Application. 
Galaxy Wearable Application has to be installed in advance.

※ Please allow the permission of Galaxy Wearable Application from Android Settings to use it completely in Android 6.0.
Settings > Apps > Watch  Active Plugin > Permissions

※ Access rights information 
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Required permissions]
- Location: Used to search for nearby devices for Watch through Bluetooth
- Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with Watch
- Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plug-in apps
- Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information
- Calendar : Used to synchronize schedule with Watch
- SMS : Used to synchronize SMS with Watch

[Optional permissions]
- Camera : Used to scan the QR code to activate Watch's SIM card(eSIM Support Model only)
descriptionHTML:
This application is a component for Galaxy Wearable Application.
Galaxy Wearable Application has to be installed in advance.

※ Please allow the permission of Galaxy Wearable Application from Android Settings to use it completely in Android 6.0.
Settings > Apps > Watch Active Plugin > Permissions

※ Access rights information
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Required permissions]
- Location: Used to search for nearby devices for Watch through Bluetooth
- Storage: Used to transmit and receive the stored files with Watch
- Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for updating apps and installing plug-in apps
- Contacts: Used to provide services that need to be linked with accounts using registered Samsung account information
- Calendar : Used to synchronize schedule with Watch
- SMS : Used to synchronize SMS with Watch

[Optional permissions]
- Camera : Used to scan the QR code to activate Watch's SIM card(eSIM Support Model only)

comments: Works in the background, in conjunction with Galaxy Wear, enabling a Samsung watch to work with another brand of phone. I did not ever notice it at all. It is likely this suite will increase battery usage, but I expected this, and it has not been a problem on my OPPO phone which has excellent battery life.

Recently watches started to disconnect every 30 minutes. Don't know the reason. Galaxy Wearable doesn't start after update 10 Jan 2020. This says a lot about quality of software written in Samsung. Fix this error. Update: okay, it started after hanging for 5 minutes. Lol.

This newer versions of the plug-in turn my phone in my own portable oven, with huge battery drain and heat generation, rolling back to last year's September update fixes it, but I lose the consistency of the watch syncing with my phone. Completely disgusting behavior on Samsung's part, a billions of dollars company, selling high-end top gadgets for a premium price with no regards to user experience

Was fine when I first got the watch, installed new updates and now keeps giving a notification saying it can't connect with the watch and can't receive notifications even though all notifications are on for the plug in. I don't want to go through the hassle of uninstalling and reinstalling everything, it'll be a farse.
What is wrong with this app? It never works and disconnects my watch!

comments: This Duality Watch face is extremely customizable. Many options and colors to make the watch as close to the way you want it. The developer could make the app even better if the background options included more designs fit for women. But overall, I think this is a really cool interactive, animated watch face that's easy to use and fun to customize.

02/26 - my newest THEMA watchface to my collection.. Love the styling.. very sporty looking. Information is accurate as usual from Thema. My only wish is that the battery meters were a little larger..
For the most part, it's a great watchface however, sometimes the weather is inaccurate. On the plus side the compliments are very responsive and work well!
Brilliant, love it. Best watch faces for Android Phones. Skilled developer. Highly recommended.

Nice looking watchface. Unfortunately it does not support tapping the weather complication to get forecast information when using the Chronus weather complication, which is a deal breaker for me. Also, if you're going to get the premium features, make the purchase on your phone as paying for it through my watch caused the phone app to not acknowledge the purchase.

title: Classic Watch Face for Wear
description:
Classic Watch Face turns your Android Wear device into an exceptional classic timepiece.

Designed in the pursuit of clarity, beauty and precision, Classic watch face is one of the most iconic watch faces for your Android Wear device.

Classic watchface is optimized for circular smartwatches such as the Moto 360 and rectangular watches as the Samsung Gear Live and the LG G Watch. Classic follows the digital watchmaker tradition.

For more custom watch faces please visit our watchface collection on http://goo.gl/QOsOu4

----
How to install Classic Watch Face:

- Download the free app on Google Play
- Open it on your mobile
- Tap & hold on the watch face on the Android Wear device
- Select one of watch faces 

In case the watch face is not present, please go to your Android Wear app on the smartphone and in settings press on synchronize apps. Then you can become your own watchmaker.
----

Visit our exclusive wearface collection for the Moto 360 and other Android Wear watches on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4.  Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be produced by our watchmakers and to be added to our selection.
----

Designed in Germany

title: Pilot One Watch Face
description:
NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2/S3 – NO TIZEN COMPATIBILITY
Not compatible on Sony Smartwatch 3 

✭✭✭ Pilot ONE Watch Face inspired by air forces timepieces ✭✭✭

We have updated our app and now the watch face is available in several languages listed below in specifications. 

Pilot ONE Watch Face, an analog watch face designed to experience the thrill of being a pilot. 

Premium version offers up to 3 fully customizable complications, 9 selected color themes and 2 ambient modes. 

Change the second movement. Switch between the classic, automatic or fluid movement.

Pilot ONE Watch Face, be a Top Gun rookie !

Swiss made watch faces created by experienced watch designers. 
Check http://www.white-group.com/



Premium features and settings

•	Up to 3 fully customizable complications
•	9 selected color themes
•	2 ambient modes
•	Altimeter battery display
•	3 different second movements (1x / second, 5 x / second or fluid)
•	Support third party complications


Free features and settings

•	Time (Hours Minutes Seconds)


Specifications

•	Optimized for low battery consumption
•	Developed for Wear OS 2.0
•	NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2/S3 – NO TIZEN COMPATIBILITY
•	No ads
•	Available in: English(default), French, Arabic, Danish, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish. 


 Installation

Wear OS 2.0 – from your smartwatch

1.	Open the playstore app via your wear device
2.	Download and install the watch face
3.	Long press and swipe right to « add more watch faces »
4.	Select your new watch face
5.	Start being in


Wear 2.0 – from your phone 

1.	Open the playstore app via your phone
2.	Make sure phone is connected to your wear device 
3.	Download and install the watch face on your phone
4.	Within seconds/minutes the watch face will appear on your wear device
5.	Customize your watch and enjoy !

 Should you experience any problem please contact us instead of smashing us. 
We will get in touch with you asap.

recentChanges: Improve stability
comments: I love the watch face -- in fact, enough that I want to purchase the premium version. However, each time I try, I am getting an error DF-PDP-3 that my purchase cannot be processed. I've never tried so many times to spend my money on a watch face, and... nothing. As for the free version, well, it's lovely, except I can't use a watch face without the complications features, which I cannot have, because I cannot purchase the premium face.
A great watchface! I love everything about it, just wish you could make the date on the right hand side look like the battery gauge. Really my only complaint but I love it otherwise!

Love this face BUT I wish the "mesh" by the battery indicator was coloured to reflect power condition and brighten it up at bit - say Green from 100-50%, yellow 49-15% and red down to zero. Would make it that little more interesting to look at.
Simple, straightforward, and easy to read.

First Wear OS watch, and being a heli pilot, this one really appealed to me in terms of looks, functionality, and customization. I can't see it getting anything but better as the dev's respond to the inputs they receive. To be honest, I hit buy and it was listed as $1.53, but I saw the get it free promotion and did that. The next one I get I will gladly pay for to assist this team, it is well deserved! I appreciate the freebie, thank you!

title: Pure Watch Face
description:
Pure is a free watch face, which looks great on the Moto 360 and other smartwatches. You can choose between the analog or the digital watch face. 
 
This watch face is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and round watches such as the Moto 360.

----

Key custom features:

o Digital Watch Face 
o Analog Watch Face 
o Puristic design
o Date 

----

How to install Pure:

o Download the free app on Google Play
o Open it on your mobile
o Tap & hold on the watch face on the Android Wear device
o Select one of the two Pure watch faces 

In case the watch face is not present, please go to your Android Wear app on the smartphone and in settings press on synchronize apps.

Weather data is based on http://openweathermap.org

----

descriptionHTML:
Pure is a free watch face, which looks great on the Moto 360 and other smartwatches. You can choose between the analog or the digital watch face.

This watch face is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and round watches such as the Moto 360.

----

Key custom features:

o Digital Watch Face
o Analog Watch Face
o Puristic design
o Date

----

How to install Pure:

o Download the free app on Google Play
o Open it on your mobile
o Tap & hold on the watch face on the Android Wear device
o Select one of the two Pure watch faces

In case the watch face is not present, please go to your Android Wear app on the smartphone and in settings press on synchronize apps.

Weather data is based on http://openweathermap.org

----

Visit our exclusive wearface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4. Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be added to our selection of watch faces.

Handcrafted in Germany
summary: Pure watch face turns your Android Wear smartwatch into a delightful timepiece
recentChanges:
Updated icons and feature banner
Updated to new API
comments: Nice looking simple watch face. However, I cant get the analog face to work (yes I tried changing the settings on the phone). I also can't get it to display weather (not sure why else it would ask why I want °C or °F). I can't find any option to change settings on the watch, which is weird. I've got the lates version of Wear OS and Android (TicWatch Pro + Pixel 3 XL). This App has not been updated in 4 years, I'm assuming supposed is discontinued does not support Wear OS 2.0. Uninstalled.
I could find no app icon on my phone after installing or on my watch. The only option through Google play was to uninstall the app, so I did.
Not working on Android 10. When open the app it says it was designed for an older version of Android.

This is almost the watch face I've been looking for for some time. All the complaints from other users are years old and they seem to have all been addressed as the face behaves itself on my watch. I use the AOD so it just remains to see the battery life

I uninstalled because my issues from over a year ago were not addressed... Would like to be able to turn off the weather option. Also the temperature unit setting keeps reverting to Fahrenheit after it is set to Celsius.

title: Destroy Watch Face
description:
Destroy Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of Destroy Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "DESTROY"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

comments: Easily my favourite watch face. I immediately purchased the premium edition. Highly configurable, but also not overly complex. Plenty of options and it looks exactly how a smart watch face ought to look. Although, I did have to purchase it twice as the Google store didn't sync it properly :(. Worth it. Developer deserves it.
Pretty sick watch face. Backgrounds are dope. The different scratched worn looks are exactly the font I want. The different angle options are genius.
Looks ok but would be nice to have a background transparency settings and an option to use your own image as background

One of the best watch faces I've had so far. My only issue was that the step counter does not update (sync with google fit step counter) unless I select another watch face and go back to this one through my watch. Sometimes it does update, but doesn't happen that often. I'm using the Fossil Q Explorist HR Gen 4. Please help with this issue since the Face is perfect and I really want to keep using this as my daily driver. The Step counter is really important for me. Thanks!
It's really awsome to be able to change the face on my watch! It will never be boring to see the same color on my watch! Love it!

comments: My fave watch face to date, goes well with my LG GWatch R with custom strap the whole thing looks neat and tidy, the watch face suits the device well.  A few things to note, it would be nice if, when using the Hide Watch/Mobile Battery options if we could then reuse the circular area now not in use for something else rather than that area remain blank.  Buying premium was well worth it, but I am somewhat annoyed the watch keeps throwing adverts for new watch faces at me now and then without a toggle, believe me if i want a new watch face i will be going straight to this dev to check for more, but throwing up ads ends up being a constant irritant.  The weather side of things is nice and simple but i noticed the watch face does indeed use my preference of Celsius, but when clicking the widget which brings up the full weather section, this part shows Fahrenheit instead of Celsius for the day/weekly view.  Beyond those little niggles, its a great watch face for every day use.

I really enjoy the customization options of this watch face. Having gotten into wear OS with a low end smartwatch (original ticwatch E), I'm leaning towards getting something with a bit more processing power as my current watch tends to lag at times. Unfortunately, all wear OS watches seem to suffer from this and I will likely get a Samsung watch as their processors are much faster. Do you make watchfaces for Tizen? If not would you ever? Nice, customizable watchfaces are so hard to find.
Best watch faces available lots of features and totally worth paying for the full versions.

This watch face is perfect but only with the premium access, which is inexpensive (€1). I highly recommend it, there are tons of customisations and it's smooth which quite a few of other watch faces aren't. One thing that put me off initially was the watermark/brandname, I didn't like it being there but I was willing to put up with it, however even that is customisable and can be toggled off with premium.

fabu-loving this watchface, been looking for one this clean and functional for a while l love this one so much I've paid again, the dude deserves it. but if it breaks, I have are a very particular set of skills, skills I have acquired over a very long career. skills  that make me a nightmare for people like you.

title: Watch Face Thon B Android Wear
description:
Thon B is a analog watch face with 16.7 million colours to choose from. 

This watch face is designed to run on round and square Android Wear watches.

FEATURES / SETTINGS:
- Customizable colour settings
- Interactive
- Screen timeout control
- Dimmed mode for extended battery life (black display)
- Notification options

This app supports all Android Wear watches including:
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 2
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 SPORT
- MOTOROLA MOTO WOMAN
- ASUS ZENWATCH
- ASUS ZENWATCH 2
- ASUS ZENWATCH 3
- SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
- LG G 
- LG G WATCH R
- LG URBANE 1ST AND 2ND GEN (NOT LTE)
- SONY SMARTWATCH 3
- HUAWEI 
- FOSSIL Q FOUNDER
- FOSSIL Q MARSHAL
- FOSSIL Q WANDER
- TAG HEUER CONNECTED
- MICHAEL KORS
- NIXON MISSION
- CASIO SMART OUTDOOR WATCH
- POLAR M600

INSTALLATION
- After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the smartwatch. It will take a few minutes for the watch to sync. You will see a pop up message on the watch when it's ready.
- You can activate the watch face from the Android Wear app or by long press on the watch.

IF THE WATCH FACE DOES NOT APPEAR:
- Check your watch device is connected in Android Wear app on phone.
- Make sure you have waited a few minutes for the watch to sync the new face on phone.
- If all else fails you can try restarting the phone / watch or reinstalling the app.

HELP AND RATINGS
- Email us if you need help, have questions, or suggestions. forzaonestudios@gmail.com  Thanks!

Please leave your comments & ratings!

You can also contact us by email or social media.

Google+:    https://plus.google.com/100824301362224146192
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Luxury-watch-faces-for-smartwatches/1520318818182092
Twitter:      https://twitter.com/Forza_One
Email:       ForzaOneStudios@gmail.com

title: Guardian Watch Face & Clock Widget
description:
Guardian Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of Guardian Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-GEN"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

comments: Very nice versatile watch face. Had some problems with the permissions and the developer was very responsive to help me get it sorted out.
Looks fantastic and tells me everything I want to know. Shame about Android's ban on 3rd party apps being able to access unread emails and SMS, but otherwise great.
So far so good. Like how you can really customize the watch face with ease.

This watchface is practical, but also very beautiful. The choices of colors and backgrounds are numerous, you could easily change the face to go with a different outfit easy day. OR, you could find the most beautiful combination of color and texture and never change. I love the elements that are customizable. 4 widgets display on the watchface continuously and 4 shortcuts you choose to be handy, like flashlight. Now my default watchface!! Missing "next appointment". That's worth another star.

Love it. But I've purchased premium it's says I have premium on my phone and all options which is great, but in my watch it says obtain premium to access the extra settings even though I own it and have all the extra in my watch Thanks for reply Deb but I have tried everything premium will not transfer to watch. I have all the options working but I can only make premium changes in the phone which is no good.

title: Comic Pow HD Watch Face Widget & Live Wallpaper
description:
This completely customizable interactive HD Android Wear / Wear OS Watch Face, Clock Widget & Live Wallpaper brings a classic elegance to your wrist and Launcher. Features include custom complications, battery levels, weather conditions, step counter, color picker & date information. A settings app will also be installed on your mobile device to configure the watch face for any look you desire. Select any color and create a completely custom look for yourself! Don't have an Android Wear watch? No Problem! You can use the clock widget or Live Wallpaper on your launcher!


💡IMPORTANT - Not compatible with Samsung Smart Watches that use Tizen or smartwatches with other operating systems than Android Wear. Please also note that as this is an HD watch face, the file is a bit larger and can take up to 5 minutes to transfer to your watch. This is normal.

★Basic Features★
✔ Launcher Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
✔ Live Wallpaper
✔ Customizable digital & or analog clock
✔ Interactive Actions (Digital, Date)
✔ Time zone selection
✔ Custom date format picker
✔ Smooth second hand
✔ 24-Hour
✔ Burn-In protection
✔ Square compatible

★Premium Features★
✔ Animated (Only watch face - NOT Widget)
✔ Widget Frames
✔ Live Wallpaper (Animated)
✔ Custom Complications (Android Wear 2.0)
✔ Screen Modes (Normal, Always Ambient, Always On)
✔ Screen on Time selection
✔ Interactive Actions (Weather, Step Counter)
✔ Peek card size selector
✔ Ambient modes selector
✔ Screen on-time selector
✔ Color picker to select any color you like for the background, clock hands, text, & numbers
✔ Save personal color themes (long press to delete theme)
✔ Clock numbers toggle
✔ Watch battery status
✔ Phone battery status (When connected to an Android Phone)
✔ Current date
✔ Step Counter
✔ Weather conditions (When connected to an Android Phone)

★Translations★
✔ English
✔ Chinese
✔ Czech
✔ Dutch
✔ French
✔ German
✔ Italian
✔ Japanese
✔ Korean
✔ Russian
✔ Spanish

★How to install★
Watch Face - Once you have installed from the Play store, you may be asked to grant permissions to the app on your phone - be sure to approve all permissions. Once the app has installed on your phone, it may take 5-10 minutes to transfer over to you watch and the Android Wear app. Please be patient. Once installed, simply long press on your watch face to bring up the selection menu, or select this watchface from the Android Wear app. Use the accompanying settings app to configure the settings and options

Widget - Depending on what launcher you are using, you can either long press on your launcher to place a widget, or select this widget from the App Drawer -> Widgets list. Customize and change the widget settings with the accompanying App.

Live Wallpaper - Depending on what launcher you are using, you can either long press on your launcher to select your Wallpaper, or you can select the Live Wallpaper from the Settings App

If you have any problems at all, please send me an email before leaving a negative review - I will do my best to fix the issue as soon as possible.

★Trouble Shooting★
http://deniteappz.com/watchface/troubleshooting.html

Stay tuned for more watch faces to come!

★5.1.0★
✔ Bug fixes...
comments: I installed and paid for the premium, but it locked up my sony smartwatch 2! I uninstalled and re-installed 3 times but same problem persisted. Can I have a refund please?

This (as well as all his other watch face apps) can be very difficult to sync from the phone over to the watch. There is a troubleshooting page on the web about this problem. But I tried everything and nothing helped. I can get it synced once in awhile (don't know how) but it's pretty random. Please FIX. EDIT: Have emailed twice.... Still no FIX!! Rating will go down 1 star per week until it works.

Looks great! even purchased full version! BUT- for the price I'd like some more interactive features i get with other faces (like calendar, music player, fit tracker, flashlight, calculator, apps, etc.) Maybe space the "complications" a bit more or add a selectable menu for each one. would be great if you can pick what goes where. could also offer some other animated background options. I really hope to see some further updates on this watch face now that its my new default. Recommended =)

A great looking watch face with some nifty features. Not tried adding complications yet but it's a useful addition. Not sure the paid version offers enough to justify the upgrade by itself but as a whole it's worth it.
what an absolute con job, the dev has a donate choice but also a choice for unlocking the app with no clear description that the donate does not cover the unlocking. BS

description:

title: Watch Face Mnari Android Wear
description:
Mnari R is a Premium watch face.

This watch face is designed to run on round and square Android Wear watches.

FEATURES / SETTINGS:
- Date and Time
- Battery power
- Dimmed mode for extended battery life (black display)
- Low battery usage

This app supports all Android Wear watches including:
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 2
- MOTOROLA MOTO 360 SPORT
- MOTOROLA MOTO WOMAN
- ASUS ZENWATCH
- ASUS ZENWATCH 2
- ASUS ZENWATCH 3
- SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
- LG G 
- LG G WATCH R
- LG URBANE 1ST AND 2ND GEN (NOT LTE)
- SONY SMARTWATCH 3
- HUAWEI 
- FOSSIL Q FOUNDER
- FOSSIL Q MARSHAL
- FOSSIL Q WANDER
- TAG HEUER CONNECTED
- MICHAEL KORS
- NIXON MISSION
- CASIO SMART OUTDOOR WATCH
- POLAR M600

INSTALLATION
- After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the smartwatch. It will take a few minutes for the watch to sync. You will see a pop up message on the watch when it's ready.
- You can activate the watch face from the Android Wear app or by long press on the watch.

IF THE WATCH FACE DOES NOT APPEAR:
- Check your watch device is connected in Android Wear app on phone.
- Make sure you have waited a few minutes for the watch to sync the new face on phone.
- If all else fails you can try restarting the phone / watch or reinstalling the app.

HELP AND RATINGS
- Email us if you need help, have questions, or suggestions. forzaonestudios@gmail.com  Thanks!

Please leave your comments & ratings!

You can also contact us by email or social media.

Google+:    https://plus.google.com/100824301362224146192
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Luxury-watch-faces-for-smartwatches/1520318818182092
Twitter:      https://twitter.com/Forza_One
Email:       ForzaOneStudios@gmail.com

comments: Very nice if it working

Did I just buy this !!! Can barely see the hands. No contrast. Today is Sunday, July 9 , looks like on the left side it reads Dec. On right side of face it reads Sun. No date that I can see. Then again , I can hardly see what any of it actually reads. So far I have found no way to set or customize or change any of the dials. The best thing about this watch face is the pictures on the install page. They look Awesome. But as an actual useful watch face , IT SUX

I'd like this app better if it had customizable dials. I mean, If i don't know what month it is,  I'm in trouble. I'd much rather have the date or weather like the better apps. Still, it looks nice and the colors are nice and bright. This app is like a Ferrari, beautiful but totally impractical.
Bought a couple watch faces, now it won't push them to my watch at all. I have tried restarting, and uninstalling all of them. Nothing is working. Junk app.

Good looking watch face, though the hands lack contrast and are therefore hard to locate.   It didn't appear for me in Android Wear on the phone or in the watch (LG Watch R with Wear 2.0), even after uninstall/reinstall and waiting, until I used Play Store on the watch to install it from the list of apps installed on the phone.

title: Diamond Ritz HD Watch Face Widget & Live Wallpaper
description:
This completely customizable interactive HD Android Wear / Wear OS Watch Face, Clock Widget & Live Wallpaper brings a classic elegance to your wrist and Launcher. With realistic reflections that respond to the way you move your wrist or mobile device in real time you will be sure to catch the eye of every onlooker! Features include custom complications, battery levels, weather conditions, step counter, color picker & date information. A settings app will also be installed on your mobile device to configure the watch face for any look you desire. Select any color and create a completely custom look for yourself! Don't have an Android Wear watch? No Problem! You can use the clock widget or Live Wallpaper on your launcher!


💡IMPORTANT - Not compatible with Samsung Smart Watches that use Tizen or smartwatches with other operating systems than Android Wear. Please also note that as this is an HD watch face, the file is a bit larger and can take up to 5 minutes to transfer to your watch. This is normal.

★Basic Features★
✔ Launcher Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
✔ Live Wallpaper
✔ Customizable digital & or analog clock
✔ Interactive Actions (Digital, Date)
✔ Time zone selection
✔ Custom date format picker
✔ Smooth second hand
✔ 24-Hour
✔ Burn-In protection

★Premium Features★
✔ Animated (Only watch face - NOT Widget)
✔ Realistic Sparkles (they appear as you move your wrist)
✔ Widget Frames
✔ Live Wallpaper (Animated)
✔ Custom Complications (Android Wear 2.0)
✔ Screen Modes (Normal, Always Ambient, Always On)
✔ Screen on Time selection
✔ Interactive Actions (Weather, Step Counter)
✔ Peek card size selector
✔ Ambient modes selector
✔ Screen on-time selector
✔ Color picker to select any color you like for the background, clock hands, text, & numbers
✔ Save personal color themes (long press to delete theme)
✔ Clock numbers toggle
✔ Watch battery status
✔ Phone battery status (When connected to an Android Phone)
✔ Current date
✔ Step Counter
✔ Weather conditions (Yahoo Weather & OpenWeatherMap) (When connected to an Android Phone)

★Translations★
✔ English
✔ Chinese
✔ Czech
✔ Dutch
✔ French
✔ German
✔ Italian
✔ Japanese
✔ Korean
✔ Russian
✔ Spanish

★How to install★
Watch Face - Once you have installed from the Play store, you may be asked to grant permissions to the app on your phone - be sure to approve all permissions. Once the app has installed on your phone, it may take 5-10 minutes to transfer over to you watch and the Android Wear app. Please be patient. Once installed, simply long press on your watch face to bring up the selection menu, or select this watchface from the Android Wear app. Use the accompanying settings app to configure the settings and options

Widget - Depending on what launcher you are using, you can either long press on your launcher to place a widget, or select this widget from the App Drawer -> Widgets list. Customize and change the widget settings with the accompanying App.

Live Wallpaper - Depending on what launcher you are using, you can either long press on your launcher to select your Wallpaper, or you can select the Live Wallpaper from the Settings App

If you have any problems at all, please send me an email before leaving a negative review - I will do my best to fix the issue as soon as possible.

★Trouble Shooting★
http://deniteappz.com/watchface/troubleshooting.html

Stay tuned for more watch faces to come!

★Google+ Community★
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/117849705573164164003/communities/106226068177418863967

title: Atomic Clock & Watch Accuracy Tool (with NTP Time)
description:
This app has two main features:
- it detects and shows exact time (via NTP protocol). It can be helpful if you want to sync time on some of your devices with atomic clock.
- it allows to track accuracy of your wristwatches. It can be helpful if you want to know how exact your wristwatch is. You can share this information with watchmaker and it helps him to adjust your watches properly.

Features in detail:

Atomic Time from NTP Servers
- Most accurate time on the earth is provides by Atomic clocks. To synchonize computer/phone clock with atomic clock you can use Network Time Protocol servers.
- This app is able to connect to NTP time servers and show you exact time
- There is list of NTP Time Servers (including goverment time servers like NIST Internet Time Service)
- On Android 8 you can use Picture-in-Picture function and adjust your clock according excact time shown in small window over other apps.

Watch accuracy tracking app
With this app you can
- track accuracy of your wristwatch collection (works well for both mechanical and quartz watches)
- simply tap in the app, let app know what time was shown on wristwatch and app will do all the statistics and show you watch accuracy chart
- share accuracy chart with your friends on social networks
- export your accuracy data as CSV for further processing

Free vs. paid functionality
- basic app functionality is for free. You can check exact time for free. You can track one of your watches for free.
- premium functionality is paid feature

Feel free to contact us if you find any bug and/or you want to suggest some improvement.

summary: Adjust your watch with Atomic (NTP) time clock and measure its accuracy
developerAddress:
Tomas Hubalek
Za Strelnici 903
744 01 Frenstat pod Radhostem
Czech Republic
recentChanges: Added Day of Month/Day of the Week indicator to atomic clock
comments: Love the app but every time I switch phones, I am logged into Google but my premium features get deleted. It's supposed to follow the account, but you have to write the author an email for him to turn on the feature, then you can see your backups and premium features. Lame dude

Works great for me, no complaints. I would however suggest letting us add a note to the time measurements so we can note whether a measurement was made after resting a watch and what position it was in or if it was being worn. But other than that good app.

Enjoying the application, it's a great place to keep track of my watches, and their accuracy. It would be nice to have the ability to configure your own NTP server(s) as well as just choosing from the popular list. Moonphase would be a great addition, too for setting watches with that complication.

It does just what it says. Has Atomic clock. Shows second hand making it easier to set a watch by. Also you can hit a button when your watch is on a particular time and it calculates the difference between atomic clock and your watch to gage accuracy. Lots of different options for paid version depending on what you want to use as far as options. Perhaps a bit price for an app, but it is refreshing to have an app that does not have adds.

Very clear and useful interface make this a superb tool for monitoring your mechanical watches. The time pip had become less useful to me since my African Grey Parrot has learned to repeat this sound continuously all day. The developer was also prompt in replying to a problem I encountered. All-in-all, a great app if you don't have parrots.

title: B-Sidz Watch Face & Clock Widget
description:
B-Sidz Watch Face for Wear OS!

Don't have a Wear OS watch? You can still use this watch face as a clock widget on your mobile!

⛔️NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 / GEAR S3 / GALAXY WATCH !! (running Tizen OS)⛔️
If you have one, do not install this application.
To find support and compatible applications with your watch, please go to http://www.themaapps.com/watch_on_tizen_os

★ Features of B-Sidz Watch Face ★

- Clock Widget (No second hand due to battery consumption)
- Choose design colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Day & Month
- Watch battery
- Mobile battery
- Weather
- Daily step count
- Heartbeat frequency
- Unread SMS
- Unread Email from Gmail
- Missed calls
- Presets
- Complication (wear 2.0)


The settings of the watch face are located in the "Wear OS" app of your mobile.
Just hit the gear icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will show up!


★ FREE Settings ★
- Choose design colors on watch & mobile
- Define heartbeat frequency refresh rate
- Define weather refresh rate
- Weather unit
- 12 / 24 hours mode
- Define interactive mode duration
- Choose to switch between small/big/translucent/opaque cards
- Choose the ambient mode b&w and eco luminosity
- Choose between 2 weather providers (Yr & OpenWeatherMap)
- Choose to display a leading zero on hours
- Display brand name or not
- Choose to display or not the seconds dots


★ PREMIUM Settings ★
- Choose your own title in place of "X-GEN"
- Switch between éco / simple b&w / full ambient mode
- Choose background among different styles
- Blend background with colors
- Define a secondary timezone for digital display
- Data:
    + Change the indicator to display on the 3 positions
    + Choose between up to 8 indicators
    + Complication (wear 2.0)
- Interactivity
    + Access to detailed data by touching a widget
    + Switch the displayed data by touching a widget
    + Change the shortcut to execute on the 4 positions
    + Choose your shortcut among all applications installed on your watch!
    + Choose to display the interactive areas
- Presets manager:
    + Save your preset with all its options (colors, backgrounds, data, features. EVERYTHING is saved!)
    + Load / delete one of your previously saved preset
    + Share / Import presets
- Define manual or automatic location


★ Installation ★
Watch Face
Wear OS 1.X
This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Wear OS 2.X
A notification will be displayed on your watch, right after your mobile installation. You just have to hit it to start the installation process of the watch face.
If the notification did not display for some reason, you can still install the watch face by using the Google Play Store available on your watch: just search the watch face by its name.

Mobile clock widget
Just long press on your launcher, then select the application widget to drop it on your home screen of your mobile.
Customize the widget settings with the application.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!


Website: http://www.themaapps.com/
Youtube: https://youtube.com/ThomasHemetri
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThomasHemetri
G+: https://plus.google.com/+ThomasHemetri
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thema_watchfaces

comments: This is one of the first faces I found for my Ticwatch S2 when I got it. I've tried so many others but keep coming back to this as my everyday watchface. It has all the info and shortcuts I need and it looks so good. The little digital clock is really easy to see in direct sun even at medium brightness. I don't know how many know this also but if on the off change one of the analog hands covers a complication, just tap the center and they disappear. Tap again to turn them back on. Great feature!

I love this app, it has so many different features, color combinations and backgrounds. It looks so nice that I got rid of the complications just to look at the backgrounds. The contrast between the watch background and the digital time zone is what got me to buy this. Awesome job dev!

Excellent watchface with many choices to allow for customization. Also, I had a question, emailed developer, got a very quick, helpful response. Very happy with my watchface purchase decision. (Ticwatch Pro)
Beautiful watch. Loads on it but would it be possible to have the option to make the date and watch battery bigger. My eyesight is not what it used to be haha. Thanks
I paid for the premium but it only works on the phone portion. In order for me to use the premium settings on the phone it wants me to purchase it again. Sneaky

- On touch, you can now access to a detailed data screen for all data
- Added "shortcuts" dials (translate, maps, timer, etc...)
- Complication (wear 2.0)


★ Installation

This watch face will be installed automatically from your phone paired.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Wear OS App > Settings and Resync all apps.

Once installed, you can select the Futuristic GUI Watch Face from the Wear OS App.
Or long tap on the current watch face screen: watch face selector screen will open.


★ More watch faces

Visit my watch faces collection for Wear OS on the Play Store at https://goo.gl/CRzXbS


** If you have any issues or questions, fill free to contact me by email (English or French language) before giving a bad rating. Thanks!

comments: I have been using this watch face for many years now and I absolutely LOVE IT. I lost it for a while because of technical issues with my watch and it made me so sad. I tried using other watch faces but I really missed this one. Thomas is a great guy and was very patient with helping me. Cannot recommend this enough!
I'd give it 5 stars if the widgets were just a little bigger. Not big enough to get in the way of the cool animation, but they are a bit of a challenge to read

Neat face, but you have to "buy a gift" for the dev/repurchase if you upgrade your phone, factory reset your phone or watch, etc. Some of the other watch faces from this dev will carry over purchases (only 1 of the 3 I purchased carried over to my new phone), but not this one.

love this watch face when it works properly. i dont know if its my phone or the watch but it doesnt vount your steps most of the time. i checked and havd everything that i need for the pedometer portion but the rest of the watch face works perfectly
great watch face, love all the customizations. really the only thing I'd like it a randomized color mode or a color shift mode that alternates through a pallet! great work!
